name: My VGA Show 2020
description:
This is my Video Game Awards Show where the presenter announces the nominees for the game of the year, then reveals the goty and this show gives you the chance to actually play the game. 

Speaking of the game, the player is badass dude with a device on his chest that shoots rays(something like Iron Man) and destoys only one type of enemy, the regular enemy not the star one. 

Your goal is to find the 3 coins scatterd around the map in order to reveal the next level button (usually spawns on the right side of the map). But be carefull how you use your ray device because you get only 5 charges, so dont waste them. You can recharge 1 use by picking up a ray bottle.

The game is made with my own custom 2d game engine that i built with openGL and C++ and this the second game that i make with it and also this is my second game jam.

I hope you enjoy!
